item.title: CVE-2023-36551|2024-09-24T19:59:51.691Z -- fortinet -- fortisiem
item.description: A exposure of sensitive information to an unauthorized actor in Fortinet FortiSIEM version 6.7.0 through 6.7.5 allows attacker to information disclosure via a crafted http request.
